project.name: Survey Management System
project.description: Admin FE environment for survey management with comprehensive risk controls

user_requirements: Aplikace poskytne admin FE prostředí pro správa dotazníků business uživatelem/vlastníkem. Vytvoření nové šablony dotazníku, struktura ze známých elementů, bez dopadů do algoritmu vyhodnocení, typologie dotazníku, activace/deaktivace, preview funkce, kopírování šablon, export šablon, editace dotazníku, nová verze šablony, uživatelský changelog, porovnání verzí, smazání verzí pouze skrze deaktivaci, přístup přes role a AD integraci, funkční moduly pro obsluhu klientů a správu dotazníků, audit.
user_instructions: dont not forget on IT operations part
epic_requirements: A. Admin FE environment provision for survey management by business users/owners with role-based access control
B. Creation of new survey templates with structured elements and without algorithm evaluation impacts
C. Survey template management including activation/deactivation, preview functions, and template copying capabilities
D. Survey template export functionality with data integrity and security controls
E. Survey editing capabilities with version control and user changelog tracking
F. Version comparison functionality with audit trail maintenance and controlled deletion through deactivation
G. Role-based access control integration with Active Directory authentication systems
H. Functional modules for client handling and survey management with operational oversight
I. Comprehensive audit capabilities for regulatory compliance and risk monitoring
J. IT operations infrastructure supporting system availability, security, and business continuity
